conbody.p: The Text tab allows you to enter textual metadata for the text. It is displayed for a text only.
Edit the language of the text by choosing an entry from the Thesaurus (entry 4- Sprachen).
Edit the script of the text by choosing an entry from the Thesaurus (entry 5- Schriftformen).
Edit the type of the text by choosing an entry from the Thesaurus (entry 11- Textsorten).
You can, of course, comment your data in the relevant "Comment" fields.
